BIO

After being made redundant from my previous job, now taking the opportunity to better myself and retrain into becoming a Web Developer! Looking forward to moving into my new career path in the future!

2016 - 2021

Telstra Health UK (Dr Foster)

Operations Engineer

My responsibilities were:

  • Creating and maintaining appropriate levels of process documentation
  • Maintaining production data processing schedules
  • Internal communications relating to data processing activity
  • Onboarding new customers and customer datasets into the Data Acquisition Platform
  • Maintaining an in-depth knowledge of the data, processes and transformations with an emphasis on providing support and guidance to customers
  • Actively contributing to the evolution of standards and processes
  • Ownership of the configuration management process for data processing
  • Maintaining the data asset register and affiliated maintenance routines including the secure destruction of data

2016 - 2016

StoreFeeder

2nd Line Support Developer

Part of the support team that was the liaison between customers and developers who helped diagnose issues through Root Cause Analysis while maintaining the web application.

  • Improved web application with senior developers support
  • Diagnosed and resolved issues with the web application
  • Provided phone support for customers
  • Holiday cover for 1st line support

2013 - 2016

Boots UK

Technical Analyst

Worked within the Applications Management - Collaboration team and I was responsible for the creating and maintaining solutions for SharePoint Online 2013 while maintaining a SharePoint On-Premise platform for Boots stores.

  • Developed solutions for SharePoint Online platform and resolve any issues with the service
  • Performed and coordinated Root Cause Analysis with the team based in India
  • Ensured that projects coming into service were following company coding standards
  • Provided support for serious issues through nights and weekends
  • Main point of contact for coordinating on-shore resource with off-shore resource
  • Mentor for apprentice who was part of team
